This is inline verbatim text: \LaTeX and a literal $. This is non-inline verbatim text: 

  % \begin{verbatim}
  %   This is verbatim text.
  % \end{verbatim}

It would also be nice to support the environment from the Verbatim package: 

  % \begin{Verbatim}
  %   This is an even more powerful verbatim environment.
  % \end{Verbatim}

We’ll see how it goes.
